snippet: As officers gave chase, guns at the ready in double-handed grips, they were trailed by dozens of civilians with cameras and cellphones held above their heads to record the action.
abstract: New York City Police officers shoot and kill knife-wielding man in Times Square after he ignores orders to drop his weapon and lunges at officers.

byline.original: By COLIN MOYNIHAN and MARC SANTORA
byline.contributor: Aaron Edwards, Patrick McGeehan, Michael Schwirtz and Lee Yarosh contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: As officers gave chase, guns at the ready in double-handed grips, they were trailed by dozens of civilians with cameras and cellphones held above their heads to record the action.

headline.seo: Police Fatally Shoot a Man Brandishing a Knife in Times Square
headline.main: Police Fatally Shoot Knife-Wielding Man in Times Square
headline.print_headline: Police Fatally Shoot a Man Brandishing a Knife in Times Square
